00019   using namespace std;
00020 
00021   const Math::real LambertConformalConic::eps_ =
00022     numeric_limits<real>::epsilon();
00023   const Math::real LambertConformalConic::epsx_ = Math::sq(eps_);
00024   const Math::real LambertConformalConic::tol_ = real(0.1) * sqrt(eps_);
00025   const Math::real LambertConformalConic::ahypover_ =
00026     real(numeric_limits<real>::digits) * log(real(numeric_limits<real>::radix))
00027     + 2;
00028 
00029   LambertConformalConic::LambertConformalConic(real a, real r,
00030                                                real stdlat, real k0)
00031     : _a(a)
00032     , _r(r)
00033     , _f(_r != 0 ? 1 / _r : 0)
00034     , _fm(1 - _f)
00035     , _e2(_f * (2 - _f))
00036     , _e(sqrt(abs(_e2)))
00037     , _e2m(1 - _e2)
00038   {
00039     if (!(_a > 0))
00040       throw GeographicErr("Major radius is not positive");
00041     if (!(_f < 1))
00042       throw GeographicErr("Minor radius is not positive");
00043     if (!(k0 > 0))
00044       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00045     if (!(abs(stdlat) <= 90))
00046       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude not in [-90, 90]");
00047     real
00048       phi = stdlat * Math::degree<real>(),
00049       sphi = sin(phi),
00050       cphi = abs(stdlat) != 90 ? cos(phi) : 0;
00051     Init(sphi, cphi, sphi, cphi, k0);
00052   }
00053 
00054   LambertConformalConic::LambertConformalConic(real a, real r,
00055                                                real stdlat1, real stdlat2,
00056                                                real k1)
00057     : _a(a)
00058     , _r(r)
00059     , _f(_r != 0 ? 1 / _r : 0)
00060     , _fm(1 - _f)
00061     , _e2(_f * (2 - _f))
00062     , _e(sqrt(abs(_e2)))
00063     , _e2m(1 - _e2)
00064   {
00065     if (!(_a > 0))
00066       throw GeographicErr("Major radius is not positive");
00067     if (!(_f < 1))
00068       throw GeographicErr("Minor radius is not positive");
00069     if (!(k1 > 0))
00070       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00071     if (!(abs(stdlat1) <= 90))
00072       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 1 not in [-90, 90]");
00073     if (!(abs(stdlat2) <= 90))
00074       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 2 not in [-90, 90]");
00075     real
00076       phi1 = stdlat1 * Math::degree<real>(),
00077       phi2 = stdlat2 * Math::degree<real>();
00078     Init(sin(phi1), abs(stdlat1) != 90 ? cos(phi1) : 0,
00079          sin(phi2), abs(stdlat2) != 90 ? cos(phi2) : 0, k1);
00080   }
00081 
00082   LambertConformalConic::LambertConformalConic(real a, real r,
00083                                                real sinlat1, real coslat1,
00084                                                real sinlat2, real coslat2,
00085                                                real k1)
00086     : _a(a)
00087     , _r(r)
00088     , _f(_r != 0 ? 1 / _r : 0)
00089     , _fm(1 - _f)
00090     , _e2(_f * (2 - _f))
00091     , _e(sqrt(abs(_e2)))
00092     , _e2m(1 - _e2)
00093   {
00094     if (!(_a > 0))
00095       throw GeographicErr("Major radius is not positive");
00096     if (!(_f < 1))
00097       throw GeographicErr("Minor radius is not positive");
00098     if (!(k1 > 0))
00099       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00100     if (!(coslat1 >= 0))
00101       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 1 not in [-90, 90]");
00102     if (!(coslat2 >= 0))
00103       throw GeographicErr("Standard latitude 2 not in [-90, 90]");
00104     if (!(abs(sinlat1) <= 1 && coslat1 <= 1) || (coslat1 == 0 && sinlat1 == 0))
00105       throw GeographicErr("Bad sine/cosine of standard latitude 1");
00106     if (!(abs(sinlat2) <= 1 && coslat2 <= 1) || (coslat2 == 0 && sinlat2 == 0))
00107       throw GeographicErr("Bad sine/cosine of standard latitude 2");
00108     if (coslat1 == 0 || coslat2 == 0)
00109       if (!(coslat1 == coslat2 && sinlat1 == sinlat2))
00110         throw GeographicErr
00111           ("Standard latitudes must be equal is either is a pole");
00112     Init(sinlat1, coslat1, sinlat2, coslat2, k1);
00113   }
00114 
00115   void LambertConformalConic::Init(real sphi1, real cphi1,
00116                                    real sphi2, real cphi2, real k1) throw() {
00117     {
00118       real r;
00119       r = Math::hypot(sphi1, cphi1);
00120       sphi1 /= r; cphi1 /= r;
00121       r = Math::hypot(sphi2, cphi2);
00122       sphi2 /= r; cphi2 /= r;
00123     }
00124     bool polar = (cphi1 == 0);
00125     cphi1 = max(epsx_, cphi1);   // Avoid singularities at poles
00126     cphi2 = max(epsx_, cphi2);
00127     // Determine hemisphere of tangent latitude
00128     _sign = sphi1 + sphi2 >= 0 ? 1 : -1;
00129     // Internally work with tangent latitude positive
00130     sphi1 *= _sign; sphi2 *= _sign;
00131     if (sphi1 > sphi2) {
00132       swap(sphi1, sphi2); swap(cphi1, cphi2); // Make phi1 < phi2
00133     }
00134     real
00135       tphi1 = sphi1/cphi1, tphi2 = sphi2/cphi2, tphi0;
00136     //
00137     // Snyder: 15-8: n = (log(m1) - log(m2))/(log(t1)-log(t2))
00138     //
00139     // m = cos(bet) = 1/sec(bet) = 1/sqrt(1+tan(bet)^2)
00140     // bet = parametric lat, tan(bet) = (1-f)*tan(phi)
00141     //
00142     // t = tan(pi/4-chi/2) = 1/(sec(chi) + tan(chi)) = sec(chi) - tan(chi)
00143     // log(t) = -asinh(tan(chi)) = -psi
00144     // chi = conformal lat
00145     // tan(chi) = tan(phi)*cosh(xi) - sinh(xi)*sec(phi)
00146     // xi = eatanhe(sin(phi)), eatanhe(x) = e * atanh(e*x)
00147     //
00148     // n = (log(sec(bet2))-log(sec(bet1)))/(asinh(tan(chi2))-asinh(tan(chi1)))
00149     //
00150     // Let log(sec(bet)) = b(tphi), asinh(tan(chi)) = c(tphi)
00151     // Then n = Db(tphi2, tphi1)/Dc(tphi2, tphi1)
00152     // In limit tphi2 -> tphi1, n -> sphi1
00153     //
00154     real
00155       tbet1 = _fm * tphi1, scbet1 = hyp(tbet1),
00156       tbet2 = _fm * tphi2, scbet2 = hyp(tbet2);
00157     real
00158       scphi1 = 1/cphi1,
00159       xi1 = eatanhe(sphi1), shxi1 = sinh(xi1), chxi1 = hyp(shxi1),
00160       tchi1 = chxi1 * tphi1 - shxi1 * scphi1, scchi1 = hyp(tchi1),
00161       scphi2 = 1/cphi2,
00162       xi2 = eatanhe(sphi2), shxi2 = sinh(xi2), chxi2 = hyp(shxi2),
00163       tchi2 = chxi2 * tphi2 - shxi2 * scphi2, scchi2 = hyp(tchi2),
00164       psi1 = Math::asinh(tchi1);
00165     if (tphi2 - tphi1 != 0) {
00166       // Db(tphi2, tphi1)
00167       real num = Dlog1p(Math::sq(tbet2)/(1 + scbet2),
00168                         Math::sq(tbet1)/(1 + scbet1))
00169         * Dhyp(tbet2, tbet1, scbet2, scbet1) * _fm;
00170       // Dc(tphi2, tphi1)
00171       real den =  Dasinh(tphi2, tphi1, scphi2, scphi1)
00172         - Deatanhe(sphi2, sphi1) * Dsn(tphi2, tphi1, sphi2, sphi1);
00173       _n = num/den;
00174 
00175       if (_n < 0.25)
00176         _nc = sqrt((1 - _n) * (1 + _n));
00177       else {
00178         // Compute nc = cos(phi0) = sqrt((1 - n) * (1 + n)), evaluating 1 - n
00179         // carefully.  First write
00180         //
00181         // Dc(tphi2, tphi1) * (tphi2 - tphi1)
00182         //   = log(tchi2 + scchi2) - log(tchi1 + scchi1)
00183         //
00184         // then den * (1 - n) =
00185         // (log((tchi2 + scchi2)/(2*scbet2)) - log((tchi1 + scchi1)/(2*scbet1)))
00186         // / (tphi2 - tphi1)
00187         // = Dlog1p(a2, a1) * (tchi2+scchi2 + tchi1+scchi1)/(4*scbet1*scbet2)
00188         //   * fm * Q
00189         //
00190         // where
00191         // a1 = ( (tchi1 - scbet1) + (scchi1 - scbet1) ) / (2 * scbet1)
00192         // Q = ((scbet2 + scbet1)/fm)/((scchi2 + scchi1)/D(tchi2, tchi1))
00193         //     - (tbet2 + tbet1)/(scbet2 + scbet1)
00194         real t;
00195         {
00196           real
00197             // s1 = (scbet1 - scchi1) * (scbet1 + scchi1)
00198             s1 = (tphi1 * (2 * shxi1 * chxi1 * scphi1 - _e2 * tphi1) -
00199                   Math::sq(shxi1) * (1 + 2 * Math::sq(tphi1))),
00200             s2 = (tphi2 * (2 * shxi2 * chxi2 * scphi2 - _e2 * tphi2) -
00201                   Math::sq(shxi2) * (1 + 2 * Math::sq(tphi2))),
00202             // t1 = scbet1 - tchi1
00203             t1 = tchi1 < 0 ? scbet1 - tchi1 : (s1 + 1)/(scbet1 + tchi1),
00204             t2 = tchi2 < 0 ? scbet2 - tchi2 : (s2 + 1)/(scbet2 + tchi2),
00205             a2 = -(s2 / (scbet2 + scchi2) + t2) / (2 * scbet2),
00206             a1 = -(s1 / (scbet1 + scchi1) + t1) / (2 * scbet1);
00207           t = Dlog1p(a2, a1) / den;
00208         }
00209         // multiply by (tchi2 + scchi2 + tchi1 + scchi1)/(4*scbet1*scbet2) * fm
00210         t *= ( ( (tchi2 >= 0 ? scchi2 + tchi2 : 1/(scchi2 - tchi2)) +
00211                  (tchi1 >= 0 ? scchi1 + tchi1 : 1/(scchi1 - tchi1)) ) /
00212                (4 * scbet1 * scbet2) ) * _fm;
00213 
00214         // Rewrite
00215         // Q = (1 - (tbet2 + tbet1)/(scbet2 + scbet1)) -
00216         //     (1 - ((scbet2 + scbet1)/fm)/((scchi2 + scchi1)/D(tchi2, tchi1)))
00217         //   = tbm - tam
00218         // where
00219         real tbm = ( ((tbet1 > 0 ? 1/(scbet1+tbet1) : scbet1 - tbet1) +
00220                       (tbet2 > 0 ? 1/(scbet2+tbet2) : scbet2 - tbet2)) /
00221                      (scbet1+scbet2) );
00222 
00223         // tam = (1 - ((scbet2+scbet1)/fm)/((scchi2+scchi1)/D(tchi2, tchi1)))
00224         //
00225         // Let
00226         //   (scbet2 + scbet1)/fm = scphi2 + scphi1 + dbet
00227         //   (scchi2 + scchi1)/D(tchi2, tchi1) = scphi2 + scphi1 + dchi
00228         // then
00229         //   tam = D(tchi2, tchi1) * (dchi - dbet) / (scchi1 + scchi2)
00230         real
00231           // D(tchi2, tchi1)
00232           dtchi = den / Dasinh(tchi2, tchi1, scchi2, scchi1),
00233           // (scbet2 + scbet1)/fm - (scphi2 + scphi1)
00234           dbet = (_e2/_fm) * ( 1 / (scbet2 + _fm * scphi2) +
00235                                1 / (scbet1 + _fm * scphi1) );
00236 
00237         // dchi = (scchi2 + scchi1)/D(tchi2, tchi1) - (scphi2 + scphi1)
00238         // Let
00239         //    tzet = chxiZ * tphi - shxiZ * scphi
00240         //    tchi = tzet + nu
00241         //    scchi = sczet + mu
00242         // where
00243         //    xiZ = eatanhe(1), shxiZ = sinh(xiZ), chxiZ = cosh(xiZ)
00244         //    nu =   scphi * (shxiZ - shxi) - tphi * (chxiZ - chxi)
00245         //    mu = - scphi * (chxiZ - chxi) + tphi * (shxiZ - shxi)
00246         // then
00247         // dchi = ((mu2 + mu1) - D(nu2, nu1) * (scphi2 +  scphi1)) /
00248         //         D(tchi2, tchi1)
00249         real
00250           xiZ = eatanhe(real(1)), shxiZ = sinh(xiZ), chxiZ = hyp(shxiZ),
00251           // These are differences not divided differences
00252           // dxiZ1 = xiZ - xi1; dshxiZ1 = shxiZ - shxi; dchxiZ1 = chxiZ - chxi
00253           dxiZ1 = Deatanhe(real(1), sphi1)/(scphi1*(tphi1+scphi1)),
00254           dxiZ2 = Deatanhe(real(1), sphi2)/(scphi2*(tphi2+scphi2)),
00255           dshxiZ1 = Dsinh(xiZ, xi1, shxiZ, shxi1, chxiZ, chxi1) * dxiZ1,
00256           dshxiZ2 = Dsinh(xiZ, xi2, shxiZ, shxi2, chxiZ, chxi2) * dxiZ2,
00257           dchxiZ1 = Dhyp(shxiZ, shxi1, chxiZ, chxi1) * dshxiZ1,
00258           dchxiZ2 = Dhyp(shxiZ, shxi2, chxiZ, chxi2) * dshxiZ2,
00259           // mu1 + mu2
00260           amu12 = (- scphi1 * dchxiZ1 + tphi1 * dshxiZ1
00261                    - scphi2 * dchxiZ2 + tphi2 * dshxiZ2),
00262           // D(xi2, xi1)
00263           dxi = Deatanhe(sphi1, sphi2) * Dsn(tphi2, tphi1, sphi2, sphi1),
00264           // D(nu2, nu1)
00265           dnu12 =
00266           ( (_f * 4 * scphi2 * dshxiZ2 > _f * scphi1 * dshxiZ1 ?
00267              // Use divided differences
00268              (dshxiZ1 + dshxiZ2)/2 * Dhyp(tphi1, tphi2, scphi1, scphi2)
00269              - ( (scphi1 + scphi2)/2
00270                  * Dsinh(xi1, xi2, shxi1, shxi2, chxi1, chxi2) * dxi ) :
00271              // Use ratio of differences
00272              (scphi2 * dshxiZ2 - scphi1 * dshxiZ1)/(tphi2 - tphi1))
00273             + ( (tphi1 + tphi2)/2 * Dhyp(shxi1, shxi2, chxi1, chxi2)
00274                 * Dsinh(xi1, xi2, shxi1, shxi2, chxi1, chxi2) * dxi )
00275             - (dchxiZ1 + dchxiZ2)/2 ),
00276           // dtchi * dchi
00277           dchia = (amu12 - dnu12 * (scphi2 + scphi1)),
00278           tam = (dchia - dtchi * dbet) / (scchi1 + scchi2);
00279         t *= tbm - tam;
00280         _nc = sqrt(max(real(0), t) * (1 + _n));
00281       }
00282       {
00283         real r = Math::hypot(_n, _nc);
00284         _n /= r;
00285         _nc /= r;
00286       }
00287       tphi0 = _n / _nc;
00288     } else {
00289       tphi0 = tphi1;
00290       _nc = 1/hyp(tphi0);
00291       _n = tphi0 * _nc;
00292       if (polar)
00293         _nc = 0;
00294     }
00295 
00296     _scbet0 = hyp(_fm * tphi0);
00297     real shxi0 = sinh(eatanhe(_n));
00298     _tchi0 = tphi0 * hyp(shxi0) - shxi0 * hyp(tphi0); _scchi0 = hyp(_tchi0);
00299     _psi0 = Math::asinh(_tchi0);
00300 
00301     _lat0 = atan(_sign * tphi0) / Math::degree<real>();
00302     _t0nm1 = Math::expm1(- _n * _psi0); // Snyder's t0^n - 1
00303     // a * k1 * m1/t1^n = a * k1 * m2/t2^n = a * k1 * n * (Snyder's F)
00304     // = a * k1 / (scbet1 * exp(-n * psi1))
00305     _scale = _a * k1 / scbet1 *
00306       // exp(n * psi1) = exp(- (1 - n) * psi1) * exp(psi1)
00307       // with (1-n) = nc^2/(1+n) and exp(-psi1) = scchi1 + tchi1
00308       exp( - (Math::sq(_nc)/(1 + _n)) * psi1 )
00309       * (tchi1 >= 0 ? scchi1 + tchi1 : 1 / (scchi1 - tchi1));
00310     // Scale at phi0 = k0 = k1 * (scbet0*exp(-n*psi0))/(scbet1*exp(-n*psi1))
00311     //                    = k1 * scbet0/scbet1 * exp(n * (psi1 - psi0))
00312     // psi1 - psi0 = Dasinh(tchi1, tchi0) * (tchi1 - tchi0)
00313     _k0 = k1 * (_scbet0/scbet1) *
00314       exp( - (Math::sq(_nc)/(1 + _n)) *
00315            Dasinh(tchi1, _tchi0, scchi1, _scchi0) * (tchi1 - _tchi0))
00316       * (tchi1 >= 0 ? scchi1 + tchi1 : 1 / (scchi1 - tchi1)) /
00317       (_scchi0 + _tchi0);
00318     _nrho0 = polar ? 0 : _a * _k0 / _scbet0;
00319   }
00320 
00321   const LambertConformalConic
00322   LambertConformalConic::Mercator(Constants::WGS84_a<real>(),
00323                                   Constants::WGS84_r<real>(),
00324                                   real(0), real(1));
00325 
00326   void LambertConformalConic::Forward(real lon0, real lat, real lon,
00327                                       real& x, real& y, real& gamma, real& k)
00328     const throw() {
00329     if (lon - lon0 >= 180)
00330       lon -= lon0 + 360;
00331     else if (lon - lon0 < -180)
00332       lon -= lon0 - 360;
00333     else
00334       lon -= lon0;
00335     lat *= _sign;
00336     // From Snyder, we have
00337     //
00338     // theta = n * lambda
00339     // x = rho * sin(theta)
00340     //   = (nrho0 + n * drho) * sin(theta)/n
00341     // y = rho0 - rho * cos(theta)
00342     //   = nrho0 * (1-cos(theta))/n - drho * cos(theta)
00343     //
00344     // where nrho0 = n * rho0, drho = rho - rho0
00345     // and drho is evaluated with divided differences
00346     real
00347       lam = lon * Math::degree<real>(),
00348       phi = lat * Math::degree<real>(),
00349       sphi = sin(phi), cphi = abs(lat) != 90 ? cos(phi) : epsx_,
00350       tphi = sphi/cphi, tbet = _fm * tphi, scbet = hyp(tbet),
00351       scphi = 1/cphi, shxi = sinh(eatanhe(sphi)),
00352       tchi = hyp(shxi) * tphi - shxi * scphi, scchi = hyp(tchi),
00353       psi = Math::asinh(tchi),
00354       theta = _n * lam, stheta = sin(theta), ctheta = cos(theta),
00355       dpsi = Dasinh(tchi, _tchi0, scchi, _scchi0) * (tchi - _tchi0),
00356       drho = - _scale * (2 * _nc < 1 && dpsi != 0 ?
00357                          (exp(Math::sq(_nc)/(1 + _n) * psi ) *
00358                           (tchi > 0 ? 1/(scchi + tchi) : (scchi - tchi))
00359                           - (_t0nm1 + 1))/(-_n) :
00360                          Dexp(-_n * psi, -_n * _psi0) * dpsi);
00361     x = (_nrho0 + _n * drho) * (_n != 0 ? stheta / _n : lam);
00362     y = _nrho0 *
00363       (_n != 0 ?
00364        (ctheta < 0 ? 1 - ctheta : Math::sq(stheta)/(1 + ctheta)) / _n : 0)
00365       - drho * ctheta;
00366     k = _k0 * (scbet/_scbet0) /
00367       (exp( - (Math::sq(_nc)/(1 + _n)) * dpsi )
00368        * (tchi >= 0 ? scchi + tchi : 1 / (scchi - tchi)) / (_scchi0 + _tchi0));
00369     y *= _sign;
00370     gamma = _sign * theta / Math::degree<real>();
00371   }
00372 
00373   void LambertConformalConic::Reverse(real lon0, real x, real y,
00374                                       real& lat, real& lon,
00375                                       real& gamma, real& k)
00376     const throw() {
00377     // From Snyder, we have
00378     //
00379     //        x = rho * sin(theta)
00380     // rho0 - y = rho * cos(theta)
00381     //
00382     // rho = hypot(x, rho0 - y)
00383     // drho = (n*x^2 - 2*y*nrho0 + n*y^2)/(hypot(n*x, nrho0-n*y) + nrho0)
00384     // theta = atan2(n*x, nrho0-n*y)
00385     //
00386     // From drho, obtain t^n-1
00387     // psi = -log(t), so
00388     // dpsi = - Dlog1p(t^n-1, t0^n-1) * drho / scale
00389     y *= _sign;
00390     real
00391       nx = _n * x, ny = _n * y, y1 = _nrho0 - ny,
00392       den = Math::hypot(nx, y1) + _nrho0, // 0 implies origin with polar aspect
00393       drho = den != 0 ? (x*nx - 2*y*_nrho0 + y*ny) / den : 0,
00394       tnm1 = _t0nm1 + _n * drho/_scale,
00395       dpsi = (den == 0 ? 0 :
00396               (tnm1 + 1 != 0 ? - Dlog1p(tnm1, _t0nm1) * drho / _scale :
00397                ahypover_));
00398     real tchi;
00399     if (2 * _n <= 1) {
00400       // tchi = sinh(psi)
00401       real
00402         psi = _psi0 + dpsi, tchia = sinh(psi), scchi = hyp(tchia),
00403         dtchi = Dsinh(psi, _psi0, tchia, _tchi0, scchi, _scchi0) * dpsi;
00404       tchi = _tchi0 + dtchi;    // Update tchi using divided difference
00405     } else {
00406       // tchi = sinh(-1/n * log(tn))
00407       //      = sinh((1-1/n) * log(tn) - log(tn))
00408       //      = + sinh((1-1/n) * log(tn)) * cosh(log(tn))
00409       //        - cosh((1-1/n) * log(tn)) * sinh(log(tn))
00410       // (1-1/n) = - nc^2/(n*(1+n))
00411       // cosh(log(tn)) = (tn + 1/tn)/2; sinh(log(tn)) = (tn - 1/tn)/2
00412       real
00413         tn = tnm1 + 1 == 0 ? epsx_ : tnm1 + 1,
00414         sh = sinh( -Math::sq(_nc)/(_n * (1 + _n)) *
00415                    (2 * tn > 1 ? Math::log1p(tnm1) : log(tn)) );
00416       tchi = sh * (tn + 1/tn)/2 - hyp(sh) * (tnm1 * (tn + 1)/tn)/2;
00417     }
00418 
00419     // Use Newton's method to solve for tphi
00420     real
00421       tphi = tchi,
00422       stol = tol_ * max(real(1), abs(tchi));
00423     // min iterations = 1, max iterations = 2; mean = 1.99
00424     for (int i = 0; i < numit_; ++i) {
00425       real
00426         scphi = hyp(tphi),
00427         shxi = sinh( eatanhe( tphi / scphi ) ),
00428         tchia = hyp(shxi) * tphi - shxi * scphi,
00429         dtphi = (tchi - tchia) * (1 + _e2m * Math::sq(tphi)) /
00430         ( _e2m * scphi * hyp(tchia) );
00431       tphi += dtphi;
00432       if (!(abs(dtphi) >= stol))
00433         break;
00434     }
00435     // log(t) = -asinh(tan(chi)) = -psi
00436     gamma = atan2(nx, y1);
00437     real
00438       phi = _sign * atan(tphi),
00439       scbet = hyp(_fm * tphi), scchi = hyp(tchi),
00440       lam = _n != 0 ? gamma / _n : x / y1;
00441     lat = phi / Math::degree<real>();
00442     lon = lam / Math::degree<real>();
00443     // Avoid losing a bit of accuracy in lon (assuming lon0 is an integer)
00444     if (lon + lon0 >= 180)
00445       lon += lon0 - 360;
00446     else if (lon + lon0 < -180)
00447       lon += lon0 + 360;
00448     else
00449       lon += lon0;
00450     k = _k0 * (scbet/_scbet0) /
00451       (exp(_nc != 0 ? - (Math::sq(_nc)/(1 + _n)) * dpsi : 0)
00452        * (tchi >= 0 ? scchi + tchi : 1 / (scchi - tchi)) / (_scchi0 + _tchi0));
00453     gamma /= _sign * Math::degree<real>();
00454   }
00455 
00456   void LambertConformalConic::SetScale(real lat, real k) {
00457     if (!(k > 0))
00458       throw GeographicErr("Scale is not positive");
00459     if (!(abs(lat) <= 90))
00460       throw GeographicErr("Latitude for SetScale not in [-90, 90]");
00461     if (abs(lat) == 90 && !(_nc == 0 && lat * _n > 0))
00462       throw GeographicErr("Incompatible polar latitude in SetScale");
00463     real x, y, gamma, kold;
00464     Forward(0, lat, 0, x, y, gamma, kold);
00465     k /= kold;
00466     _scale *= k;
00467     _k0 *= k;
00468   }
00469 
00470 } // namespace GeographicLib
